title: Did illaoi and gp got to consumate their relationship ?
body:
Did they ...?

Or it was just platonic

replies.body: They did.

> [{quoted}](name=WAAARGHbobo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=PMllmgnO,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-01-06T21:07:21.000+0000)
>
> They did.

Thanks for confirming it ?

Where you got that confirmation ?
He's a writer for the game's lore. Most things they say about lore can be considered canon.

> [{quoted}](name=FurorDivinus27,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=PMllmgnO,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2018-01-06T21:58:54.099+0000)
>
> He's a writer for the game's lore. Most things they say about lore can be considered canon.

Oh, i didnt knew if this particular rioter was involved in illaoi concept. But was great to have a response{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

> [{quoted}](name=WAAARGHbobo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=PMllmgnO,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-01-06T21:07:21.000+0000)
>
> They did.

I am not sure if i will ever get that Image out of my head xD
You know for a fact Illaoi wore the trousers in their relationship if you know what I mean. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
ew
Can you make a new champ thats their child? also make the kid use barrels with tentacles inside.
When do we get the color story detailing this encounter~?
Did they have a child????

I'm guessing they'd have their fun and all, it certainly didn't seem like a toxic relationship nor a really hard breakup. Illaoi has even admitted to still having feelings for Gangplank.

Speaking of which, as an Illaoi player myself, I think that (considering how old Gangplank looks) Illaoi's either in her late 30's or very early 40's.

> [{quoted}](name=BonzaiBuddy,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=PMllmgnO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-05T22:23:56.544+0000)
>
> I'm guessing they'd have their fun and all, it certainly didn't seem like a toxic relationship nor a really hard breakup. Illaoi has even admitted to still having feelings for Gangplank.
> 
> Speaking of which, as an Illaoi player myself, I think that (considering how old Gangplank looks) Illaoi's either in her late 30's or very early 40's.

Grown women can't have daddy issues?
If anything, Gangplank would have mommy issues.

> [{quoted}](name=TheGreatRasputin,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=PMllmgnO,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-06T01:16:29.222+0000)
>
> If anything, Gangplank would have mommy issues.

I like that I was downvoted for making a joke xD

They almost certainly would. They were described as "lovers"

And if I recall Illaoi was GP's first.

And I'm sure she broke him in.

{{champion:420}} used to like the bad boys {{champion:41}} 

But now she's looking for a real man who won't break {{champion:201}}
If she was wearing her original Battlecast clothes in one of the times then Gankplank was lucky
You think Illaoi would't smash?
The kind of cute, naive questions asked by young preteens.....

Yeah I also that this post was _cute_. Absolutely what I was thinking.

Calm your pits.
Well it is a cute question. It implies a very superficial, naive, young understanding of sex and relationships. Like a kid asking where do babies come from: it's cute.
Or it's just silly curiosity and your using cute to be arrogant and pull yourself onto a high horse.
Age isn't something to use to put yourself con a high borse. Correct grammar, however.......
Illaoi had sex before marriage? B E G O N E T H O T
